info.modalContent:
Templates are reusable report configurations that allow you to generate consistent Google Ads & Meta Ads reports with a single click.

With templates, you can:
• Define a standard set of slides and metrics for recurring reports
• Pre-configure Google Ads accounts and campaigns to analyze
• Set default analysis periods (last 7 days, last month, etc.)
• Create reports instantly without reconfiguring settings each time
• Use templates as the basis for scheduled automated reports

Templates are perfect for standardizing your reporting process and ensuring consistency across account deliverables.
